short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: simple extension to allow quick add drop for cityu students

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension that allows quick add/drop courses in CityU aims system.
It is an open-source project, source code can be found in https://github.com/indie-dev-ckl/cityu-quick-add-drop
